list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Added NumberConversion Java program for decimal to binary, octal, and hexadecimal conversions
This commit adds a Java program that allows users to input a decimal number and select a conversion type: binary, octal, or hexadecimal. The program performs the conversion and displays the result. It also handles fractional parts and displays the result accordingly.
- Created a NumberConversion class with methods for hexadecimal conversion, array to hexadecimal conversion, and decimal conversion. - Implemented decimal to binary, octal, and hexadecimal conversion functionality. - Validated user input for the conversion type (1 for binary, 2 for octal, 3 for hexadecimal). - Displayed the converted result. - Added input prompts and error handling for invalid inputs.
Usage: 1. Enter a decimal number. 2. Select the conversion type (1 for binary, 2 for octal, 3 for hexadecimal). 3. The program displays the converted result.
This program provides a useful utility for converting decimal numbers into different number systems.
[Optional: Add more details or explanations if needed]
